Reviews.Title: Socket part is so weak.
Reviews.Author: Heeju Jeong
Reviews.Content: I combined product like included instruction, but ball socket part plastic (part of holder) is broken. I try just first time.This part is so weak. If you buy this product, you might oreder spare holder parts too.Quality is so awful.

Reviews.Title: A Unique and Innovative Product
Reviews.Author: Mark S.
Reviews.Content: I got this product so I don't have to continually hand hold my iPad Mini or support it some other uncomfortable way to view it. I like to sit back on my couch and have the iPad directly in front of my eyes. The flexible coil works great on a flat surface but on my couch I twist the coil 90 degrees, insert it in between the seat cushions, adjust it for the best view - then relax

Reviews.Title: awesome
Reviews.Author: riggly978 "riggly978"
Reviews.Content: really great stand, only issue is the weight of the stand.  it's tough to travel on a plane w/it but for in home & coffee shops it works well.  quick delivery, great vendor

Reviews.Title: love it
Reviews.Author: Marcy Birch
Reviews.Content: this item was bought as a Christmas gift for my husband he lovesit...great customer support!!! So happy with this purchase!!!

Reviews.Title: PED4 Coil IPM10 - iPad mini stand
Reviews.Author: SRE
Reviews.Content: It works great and dose exactly what I want it to do. Well made and should last a long time

Reviews.Title: It is Fabulous!
Reviews.Author: Julia A. Rice "bigbird"
Reviews.Content: I am using it for FaceTimeworkouts with my personal trainerAlso plan on using it to make a training videofor my employees

Reviews.Title: Good stuff
Reviews.Author: Carlos
Reviews.Content: This little gadget works very well.  The only problem I have with it is securing the ipad with a case.  It holds it okay but it falls at times.
